sentences.en: A discovery published in September 2001 may nudge that process along.
sentences.cn: 去年9月发表的一份报告也许能让我们更接近目标.

sentences.en: Close friends and married couples nudge that up to 35 percent.
sentences.cn: 亲密的朋友、已婚夫妇在这一数字上为35%.

sentences.en: haven't seen much of the beach—we've been catching up on our sleep (nudge nudge).
sentences.cn: （我们）没怎么看海滩——我们一直在补充睡眠（那个事情）。

sentences.en: He gave his friend who had fallen asleep a nudge.
sentences.cn: 他的朋友睡着了,他用肘轻轻地捅了他一下.

sentences.en: Her own momentum will then nudge her into an escape orbit.
sentences.cn: 她自己的动力会推动她进入逃跑轨道.

sentences.en: I gave him a nudge and he understood at once.
sentences.cn: 我用肘轻轻推了他一下,他马上就明白了.

sentences.en: I had a feeling that the challenge appealed to him. All he needed was a nudge.
sentences.cn: 我感觉这个挑战对他颇具吸引力，他所需要的就是一点推动。

sentences.en: McKinnon gave the wheel another slight nudge.
sentences.cn: 麦金农又轻轻推了一下轮子。

sentences.en: People began to nudge the couple into going away.
sentences.cn: 人们开始劝说这两口子走开.

sentences.en: She gave me a gentle nudge in the ribs to tell me to shut up.
sentences.cn: 她用肘轻轻捅了一下我肋骨让我住口.

sentences.en: She slipped her arm under his and gave him a nudge.
sentences.cn: 她挽住他的胳膊，轻轻推了他一下。

sentences.en: The article then listed a series of nudge-nudge, wink-wink rumors that have appeared in newspapers over the last two years.
sentences.cn: 文章接下来列举了过去两年间报纸上出现过的一连串性丑闻传言。

sentences.en: They nudge the back of our necks with their trunks.
sentences.cn: 用她的鼻子在我们脖子上推一下.

sentences.en: They've been spending a lot of time together, nudge nudge , wink wink.
sentences.cn: 他们老混在一起, 眉来眼去, 卿卿我我的.

sentences.en: We have to nudge politicians in the right direction.
sentences.cn: 我们必须把搞政治的推向正确的方向.

words.tran_cn: 推动；用肘轻推；没完没了抱怨的人

phrases.tran_cn: 那个事情（用于引起对前述内容中关于性行为暗示的注意）

trans.tran_cn: 推进；用肘轻推；向…不停地唠叨
trans.tran_en: to move something or someone a short distance by gently pushing
